channel.title: Why Caffeine Keeps You Trapped, Here's 4 ways to ESCAPE - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: The cycle of caffeine addiction can be vicious. Just like any other drug. The cycle goes like this: Caffeine causes a variety of pains and withdrawal symptoms. > You use caffeine to relieve these pains and withdrawal symptoms. > Caffeine causes pains and withdrawal symptoms. Unless you can break this pattern. You will be trapped in this cycle forever. How do you break the cycle? Here are 4 options for breaking the cycle.
